snippet.title: Akimbot | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.akimbotgame.com/  
Akimbot launches August 29 on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC. 

Join Shipset and Exe in the new classic platformer, Akimbot! Blast through Evilware’s galaxy-spanning army, stop him on his warpath, and save the universe from impending doom!  

Play as Exe, an outlaw robot with his unexpected sidekick, Shipset, as you blast your way through armies of robots, pilot spaceships, and forge your own path on a mission to save the universe. Set in a sci-fi world where only robots exist, travel the galaxy and experience non-stop robot mayhem and explosive action! 

 
Follow our socials:  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/akimbot_game  
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@akimbot_game  
Discord: https://discord.gg/FujpKaVJpG 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/akimbot_game/?hl=en 
 

#Akimbot #PLAION #indiegame
